aka: Wyprawa po skarby z Bettany Hughes
this_title: Bettany Hughes' Treasures of the World Season 2
trans_title: 贝塔尼·休斯的世界宝藏 第二季
Wyprawa po skarby z Bettany Hughes
introduction: Join host Bettany Hughes as she once again lifts the lid on the most fabulous and remarkable treasures of civilisation, celebrating what ordinary people, through time, can achieve through sheer force of will and inspiration. With unprecedented access to unfolding excavations, Bettany journeys from Cyprus to Turkey, sitting on the edge of Eastern Europe and Asia, to the deserts of Jordan via the silk roads of Azerbaijan, bounded by the sparkling Caspian Sea and the Caucasus mountains.S2 E1 ArabiaS2 E2 JordanS2 E3 CyprusS2 E4 Turkey: Sea and SecretsS2 E5 Turkey: The Delights of the EastS2 E6 AlbaniaS2 E7 OmanS2 E8 Azerbaijan
chinese_title: 贝塔尼·休斯的世界宝藏 第二季
foreign_title: Bettany Hughes' Treasures of the World Season 2
